verses.verse: For Zion's<WH6726> sake<WH4616> will I not hold<WH2814> my peace,<WH2814> and for Jerusalem's<WH3389> sake<WH4616> I will not rest,<WH8252> until<WH5704> the righteousness<WH6664> thereof go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> as brightness,<WH5051> and the salvation<WH3444> thereof as a lamp<WH3940> that burns.<WH1197>

And the Gentiles<WH1471> shall see<WH7200> your righteousness,<WH6664> and all<WH3605> kings<WH4428> your glory:<WH3519> and you shall be called<WH7121> by a new<WH2319> name,<WH8034> which<WH834> the mouth<WH6310> of the LORD<WH3068> shall name.<WH8034>
You shall also be a crown<WH5850> of glory<WH8597> in the hand<WH3027> of the LORD,<WH3068> and a royal<WH4410> diadem<WH6797> in the hand<WH3709> of your God.<WH430>

You shall no<WH3808> more<WH5750> be termed<WH559> Forsaken;<WH5800> neither<WH3808> shall your land<WH776> any more<WH5750> be termed<WH559> Desolate:<WH8077> but you shall be called<WH7121> Hephzibah,<WH2657> and your land<WH776> Beulah:<WH1166> for the LORD<WH3068> delights<WH2654> in you, and your land<WH776> shall be married.<WH1166>

For as a young<WH5288> <WH970> man marries<WH1166> a virgin,<WH1330> so shall your sons<WH1121> marry<WH1166> you: and as the bridegroom<WH2860> rejoices<WH4885> over<WH5921> the bride,<WH3618> so shall your God<WH430> rejoice<WH7797> over<WH5921> you.

I have set<WH6485> watchmen<WH8104> on your walls,<WH2346> O Jerusalem,<WH3389> which shall never<WH3808> hold<WH2814> their peace<WH2814> day<WH3117> nor night:<WH3915> you that make mention<WH2142> of the LORD,<WH3068> keep not silence,<WH1824>
And give<WH5414> him no<WH408> rest,<WH1824> till<WH5704> he establish,<WH3559> and till<WH5704> he make<WH7760> Jerusalem<WH3389> a praise<WH8416> in the earth.<WH776>

The LORD<WH3068> has sworn<WH7650> by his right<WH3225> hand,<WH3225> and by the arm<WH2220> of his strength,<WH5797> Surely<WH518> I will no<WH518> more<WH5750> give<WH5414> your corn<WH1715> to be meat<WH3978> for your enemies;<WH341> and the sons<WH1121> of the stranger<WH5236> shall not drink<WH8354> your wine,<WH8492> for the which<WH834> you have labored:<WH3021>

But they that have gathered<WH622> it shall eat<WH398> it, and praise<WH1984> the LORD;<WH3068> and they that have brought<WH6908> it together shall drink<WH8354> it in the courts<WH2691> of my holiness.<WH6944>

Go<WH5674> through,<WH5674> go<WH5674> through<WH5674> the gates;<WH8179> prepare<WH6437> you the way<WH1870> of the people;<WH5971> cast<WH5549> up, cast<WH5549> up the highway;<WH4546> gather<WH5619> out the stones;<WH68> lift<WH7311> up a standard<WH5251> for the people.<WH5971>

Behold,<WH2009> the LORD<WH3068> has proclaimed<WH8085> to the end<WH7097> of the world,<WH776> Say<WH559> you to the daughter<WH1323> of Zion,<WH6726> Behold,<WH2009> your salvation<WH3468> comes;<WH935> behold,<WH2009> his reward<WH7939> is with him, and his work<WH6468> before<WH6440> him.
And they shall call<WH7121> them, The holy<WH6944> people,<WH5971> The redeemed<WH1350> of the LORD:<WH3068> and you shall be called,<WH7121> Sought<WH1875> out, A city<WH5892> not forsaken.<WH5800>
